item.description:
A gathering of freedom-loving minds and a celebration of liberty!

Doors open at 5pm, show starts at 6:30pm - suggested $20 donation.

Join us for a special fund-raising event with musical performances by Rising Tribe, Randy Robbins and Bullethead.

Facebook event page: www.facebook.com/events/230897277021426/

Randy Robbins is an acoustic folk-rock singer/songwriter whose beautifully-crafted original songs carry the essence and heart of the 1960s. When Randy shares his music, listeners know they're experiencing something special. He is often referred to by fans as, "The reincarnation of John Lennon" not only for his uncanny physical resemblance to the legendary Beatle, but because of his gifted song-writing ability and uplifting live performances that have been winning the hearts of audiences throughout New England where he resides and beyond.

http://www.randyrobbinsmusic.com

 

 

Rising Tribe is a Boston-based original band that plays Island Alternative a funky mix of Reggae, Pop, Rock, Dancehall, & Ska.  This unique brand of mainstream Pop – Reggae has gained them fans of all ages in New England & beyond.

http://www.risingtribemusic.com

 

 

Original New England Rock and Roll!

http://bullethead.bandcamp.com
item.name: "Rise Up for Liberty" Night at the Liberty Clubhouse
